name: Is It Real?
description:
2-4 CARDS EACH DISPLAY SOMETHING. ONLY ONE IS NOT REAL. SPOT IT AND CLICK IT AS FAST AS POSSIBLE!

can you beat 1000 points on hard mode? video proof in comments and you will get a shoutout in this desription!

FOR MAC/LINUX DOWNLOAD, CONTACT ME ON DICORD RedEagle#9832

v1.1 - FULL UPDATE IS IN THE MAKING!!! follow my itch.io to stay tuned!

if you would like to see the evolution of the game, frome prototype to finish, press "Download" and you will get a folder including all versions!!!

Made in 7 days by Antonin Stern for Brackeys game jam 2022.1 with theme "it is not real" using the Godot game engine!

these assets were used:

https://freevectormaps.com/india/IN-EPS-01-0005?ref=atr

https://freevectormaps.com/france/FR-EPS-01-1001?ref=atr

Thank you for playing, and don't forget to leave a review for the jam if you are participating.

Peace,

Antonin Stern
